name: Rotation Relocation
description:
** Made for Kenney Jam 2021 **

The residents of this town are never happy with their house's location for long. You play as the pilot of a crane, tasked with moving these finicky residents to new locations, fulfilling their requests and convincing them to stay for as long as you can.

Gameplay

Residents will request their house to be moved to a new location, with a specific feature. They may want to be near the beach or river, or may want to be away from the highway.

Pick their house up with your crane, and move them to a new location to keep them happy.

Fail 10 requests and the game is over.

Controls ARotate the crane anti-clockwise (left)DRotate the crane clockwise (right)
WMove the hook towards the craneSMove the hook towards the cameraQMove the hook upwardsEMove the hook downwardsSPACEHook/Unhook the housesESCPause the game Kenney Jam 2021

This game was created for the 2021 Kenney Jam - a 48 hour game jam with the theme "Rotation".

Unfortunately, due to last minute bugs and errors, I was unable to upload a working submission before the jam deadline. I worked for another couple of hours the following day to squash the bugs, and upload a working build.

I plan to continue the development of this game, as I find the concept to be fun and interesting, so I thought it would be good to upload the prototype here.
